solution_line_template: Three kilograms of chicken cost ${chicken_cost_per_kg} x {chicken_quantity_bought} = $<<{chicken_cost_per_kg}*{chicken_quantity_bought}={cost_of_3kg_chicken}>>{cost_of_3kg_chicken}.
So, a 3-kilogram of chicken and a kilogram of pork cost ${cost_of_3kg_chicken} + ${pork_cost_per_kg} = ${total_cost}.
